subject: Re: [Radiance-general] IESNA Files & LumBuild
body:
Thanks for all the help. After going back and reviewing the units amongst my files and getting everything positioned properly it is now working!

One small stumbling block, I was initially using a negative value to scale in xform instead of a decimal (-2 vs .5) which obviously doesn?t work. Apparently I got used to using the negative value with the AIM, PIVOT, etc in rvu, and transferred that to xform!

Brian

-----Original Message-----
Sent: Wednesday, June 04, 2014 8:07 AM
To: Radiance general discussion
Brian, send me your .ies file as an attachment.
Rob

shakespe at indiana.edu
